game.name: MULLET MADJACK
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: MULLET MAD JACK은 플레이어를 클래식 애니 속으로 곧바로 데려가는 빠른 속도의 싱글 플레이 FPS입니다. 캐릭터를 강화해 마지막 층에 도착하고, 최고 시간 기록을 경신하거나 다시 시도하세요. 급할수록… 더 서두르세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: MULLET MADJACK is a HIGH-OCTANE-ACTION SHOOTER that put you directly inside a CLASSIC ANIME. Pick your favorite weapon and reach the last floor; Beat your best time or try again. Haste makes waste… OF YOUR ENEMIES!

reviewHighlights.text: Extremely fast paced action, I love this so much. Very hard on higher difficulties (duh), but still very fair. This was probably a skill issue on my e...
In the most neutral way possible I can tell this game was made by a brazillian redditor.
